Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. This product holds significant value for me, reflecting over $150 in its development and sourcing. Given its high quality and functionality, I believe it could be incredibly beneficial to you as well. Considering its worth, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $120. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that I am confident will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
